title: Since 6days there is no HELP from riot, you care only about money?
body:
Hello everyone.

So since 7 or 6days im trying to connect to LOL but its not possible, first I was getting grey coloured login buttons after trying several things you have posted on boards and several attempts It didnt workout, 2days after update finally client RECOGNIZE SMTH BY ITSELF AND STARTS THE UPDATE BUT THE UPDATE FROOZE AT 0% , I was like maybe just a lil freeze but after 10 hours of checking on my update it was still on 0% , I unistalled the game , reinstalled the game from client files I had from the last time I have downloaded them it didnt work, checked my firewall antivirus systems , flushed my dns etc.

So I was about to download completly new client from your leaugeoflegends page and guess what? Your links are dead and cant connect to any of them.

Are you paid for doing smth or you are paid to get money from players and not giving them a chance to play? 

and for the last : fuck you im done.

Greetings from Slovenia the country RIOT doesnt give a fuck

replies.body:
We don't treat players differently based on money they've spent on League.  I do want to help with your issue though, it sounds pretty stressful!  This might be happening due to a security setting that's blocking your game files from updating, so it's getting stuck at 0.  As your first step, I recommend going over every step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help troubleshoot this.  If you're unable to access the support page or our site, then there might be a stricter setting completely blocking you off.  

If that's the case, send us an email instead via support@riotgames.com.  Our tech team will take a look and reply back as soon as possible!

How would you feel?

Easiest way is to answer like you did, im not trying to be offensive but guess there is no other way,I've read several forum posts / troubleshooting stuff and all I can see is ppl keep spamming about problems, guess im the 1 of them now too, its my 1st post since I started playing leauge from season 2.

Things went just too far this week.

Thanks for the answer btw I appriciate it ;)

Greetings Qing
